website_summaries.verdict: These wood chips in resealable tubs work well for indoor smoking.
pros: Each flavor comes in a resealable pint container for easy storage
Flavor variety includes alder, hickory, oak, and cherry
cons: Very small chips more like sawdust may be too small for some users

customer_reviews.title: complete and utter RIPOFF. sawdust in a tiny container ...
customer_reviews.text: complete and utter RIPOFF. sawdust in a tiny container. should be about a buck a pint, not $4 I bought a HUGE bag of apple chips for less than $4 on Amazon. Should have simply bought 4 bags instead of wasting my money of four of these tiny cartons. I suspect the cartons are worth more than the wood! Couldn't believe it when I opened the tiny box!
customer_reviews.author: PaL

customer_reviews.title: What a Flavor it adds to a steak!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Works perfectly in my Gourmia Cold Infusion Smoker. I have only used the hickory so far, but what an AMAZINGLY strong Hickoy smoke flavor it gave to my NY Strip steak. I would buy again, but it may be a while because I only needed a teaspoon at a time so it might last a long time and I have four typed hardwood to use and try. Thanks for a wonderful product and a resounding YES I will purchase again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: They work, but not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be wood chips in a bucket. But they are wood shavings in a small cup. I tried them in my Masterbuilt MES 30 and the shavings work. They create smoke. But unlike wood chips or even pellets (used in the attachment sometimes) these shavings create a LOT of smoke in a hurry and burn out fast. Luckily I was smoking chicken wings and didn't need a long smoke. With these shavings, I would have been refilling the chamber every ten to fifteen minutes tops.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: This works really well in an electric smoker
customer_reviews.text: If you have an electric smoker which requires pellets or sawdust, these are great. There's enough sawdust here to do about two smokes from each bucket if you're using the four hour rule (add wood every hour for four hours) and filling up the hopper. There's good variety. I think the flavors could be a bit stronger since the wood is kiln dried and not sappy in the least - so it's got good smoke flavor but it's all sort of the same. If you want smoke flavor and you're not looking for hugely forward "cherry" flavor, for instance, these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Knarr

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t Worked for Me Yet
customer_reviews.text: The variety pack offers a good choice to sample woods among the most popular for grilling. The chips were not what I was expecting as they are fine, similar to coarse sawdust. I have tried to use these several times in a vented stainless steel box in a propane grill. So far no smoke and no discernible difference in the taste in beef, fish, or chicken. Maybe they will work more effectively with a charcoal or pellet grill. As for propane grills, I don’t recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great chips for small infusion smokers!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these wood chips at the same time that I ordered the "Gourmia GSM160 Portable Infusion Smoker" and they are a great match. The chips are very finely ground and the perfect size for this little portable smoker. Just a pinch or two is needed, so I expect these four pints will last a very long time - even though I'll probably be experimenting and smoking just about everything in sight for awhile! I did my first test drive last night, using the hickory chips to smoke some chicken wings, and the flavor was amazing. I look forward to trying the other chip flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: One of my VERY BEST finds!
customer_reviews.text: VERY excited to learn of an indoor option to traditional smoking. Bought a BEAUTIFUL Demeyere stovetop smoker and needed to find the fine Smoker Wood Chips to use with it. I was hesitant to try this (it seemed like such a brutal method for any cookware) but since I can't currently use an outdoor grill/smoker I decided to take the plunge. Well, I am beyond happy with the way these Smoker chips (really fine, fine, fine shavings) performed and the delectable FLAVOR they imparted to my Wild Alaskan Sockeye salmon could NOT have been better. (I used the Alder wood). One of my very best finds!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Small containers. I was allergic to the cherry wood burning.
customer_reviews.text: The initial quality of these wood chips are good. The containers are rather small for any serious smoking. The chip sizes are small, so they burn fast. I would recommend soaking them to get longer burn times. I had a breathing reaction when I burned the cherry wood chips. I tried using the cherry wood on 3 different occasions, with the same allergic reaction. I did not experience any effects with the other wood varieties. Anyone wonder if the trees, or even chips, were treated with chemicals (for bugs or otherwise). And if that even is required to be disclosed?
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Great sample pack for experienced smokers!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for an experienced meat smoker, and he loved the variety. He especially loved the pulp over larger chips, as he did not have to leave them out soaking for a day before use. Each pint has more than enough for several small uses, and are packaged neatly for ease of use. I will likely be purchasing their different variety packs, and recommend them to anyone trying to learn the difference in taste between the woods without breaking the bank!
customer_reviews.author: Kbelle26

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & Good
customer_reviews.text: This is the best value of smoker chips I found on Amazon. The amount you get for what you pay can't be beat at the moment. You get a variety of flavors and they are all good. Disclaimer: Some people don’t realize or read that these are sawdust sized chips meant for small smoking devices. Don’t expect what you would normally use for your grill or smokeboxes, etc.. I use these for my Breville Smoking Gun and it tastes exactly the same as the Breville chips to me.
customer_reviews.author: Noel G.

customer_reviews.title: Bad reviewers simply can't read
customer_reviews.text: These are as advertised. They are perfect for my smoke gun and I mad the best smoked old fashioned I ever tasted. If you buy these, then complain that they're tiny pint sized containers and they are "like sawdust"...um that's on you bro. That's clearly in the description. You only need a pinch of this stuff to make some nice smoke...these will last forever. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Just received, haven't used yet
customer_reviews.text: My concern is that there is nothing about the California Proposition 65 Warning in the detailed information before purchasing the product. There's probably nothing wrong in using this as people smoke food all the time, but in the last year, I've heard of more cases of cancer it seems like, than I have in a life time; some of those being my daughter and several of our relatives closest friend. I just really think you should have included this information with the details when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Not Your Average Nana

customer_reviews.title: Very small pieces, not chunks.
customer_reviews.text: They are like pebbles, not chunks of wood. I honestly can say I had no idea what I was buying besides wood for the smoker. I purchased a smoker for my husband and purchased the chips as well. My husband used them and they burned off rapidly. This review is for description purposes so you know what the contents are. 3 stars because it was not what I expected based on title.
customer_reviews.author: HTH214

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic smoker's friend.
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about purchasing this product after reading some of the reviews. But I decided to go ahead and step out, and take my chances. It was a great choice that I made. The small chips works perfectly inside of my little handheld smoker. The flavor, the smoke and everything came out, just as if I had used a smoke house or smoker.
customer_reviews.author: FlopFilm

customer_reviews.title: This is saw dust, NOT chips!
customer_reviews.text: Shame on me for not reading the description more... but... in no way should these be called “wood chips”. There is no a single chip in these cups, it is wood shavings. I saw wood chips and assumed it would be like every other wood chip on amazon. Not at all, these work, but are used up QUICKLY. If you have an electric smoker, like a masterbuilt, look elsewhere. You do NOT want these “chips”. What a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: for indoor smokers only, and expensive for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much what you expect - wood sawdust. Cost for the manufacturer is pretty cheap (maybe something they used to throw away) and the price to consumers is pretty high. If you need it for a stovetop smoker, that's what you need to get.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight

customer_reviews.title: It's wood, it burns, and it's affordable
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Breville Smoking Gun for my dad and brother, which comes with a TINY sample of wood chips. Not being one who wants to give the gift that keeps on costing you more money, I wanted to give them a decent supply of chips to use as well. I looked at the Breville chips, and they were ABSURDLY expensive. I didn't do the math, but these are like, what, an order of magnitude less expensive by weight for... wood chips. Can't really go wrong there.
customer_reviews.author: Dahamma

customer_reviews.title: Add a Mild Smoke Flavor Using These Chips
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with a Breville smoking gun. The gun uses such a small amount of chips that these 4 containers are going to last a long time. I really like the ease that the smoke flavor can be added to meat using these chips with the Breville unit. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cherry did not smoke!
customer_reviews.text: Tried usong alder and cherry in the a-maze-n maze for cold smoking. Alder smoked beautifuly and lasted about 7 hours. Cherry, however did not smoke at all! I tired for 3 hours to light it up using a lighter and a napkin, a torch, a gas stove, and a heat gun. With the heat gun, I made sure to create a big fire before leaving it. It smoked for maybe a minute before going out. Now my fish is undersmoked for new years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t burn
customer_reviews.text: These would not burn / smolder when used in a smoking gun (which they are advertiser for). Maybe if you used them in a large open fire they would work but I wound up having to buy the branded variety (which DO work).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No difference between them
customer_reviews.text: Though this was a variety package, every single one smelled EXACTLY the same. The person I gifted this to said he used 2 of them with a fish dinners and both dinners had no flavor. So, a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: kes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for cocktail smoker
customer_reviews.text: These are expensive compared to the store But the convenience is worth it A lot comes in them I find the size to be good for our cocktail smoker Good smell Would buy again Mine did not come open in shipping
customer_reviews.author: D B

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love to have a variety of wood chips to change up the smoke flavor. I've used it on ham, turkey breast and steak before I fry it. Will purchase again when I run out. Highly recommend to anyone who likes to mix up their smoky flavors. Used with my indoor smoker with very satisfying flavors.
customer_reviews.author: WiQ

customer_reviews.title: Needs more drying to work better
customer_reviews.text: The wood had a hard time staying smoldering. The time the food did have contact with the smoke it did impart a mellow smoke flavor. I might have to dry out the wood in a low temp oven to see if it helps
customer_reviews.author: Eva vonseggern

customer_reviews.title: Understand What You are Getting
customer_reviews.text: The product has the texture of coarse sawdust. It is what it says it is, but the small granules don't last enough in a smoker grill to effectively smoke barbecued food. Better choices exist.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Eisner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: These are great chips...They ignite easily and generate a nice smoke! I've used them for meats, fish, cheeses and cocktails in my smoke gun...I barely put a dent in these. They will last me years.
customer_reviews.author: F. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Little Tool
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how much smoke this little thing produces and almost instantly when I turned it on. I can see all sorts of applications in the near future that I want to try. Suggest that it be used outside or very near an exhaust fan, as well as a long way from a smoke detector...!!! I learned the hard way...!!! Great device.
customer_reviews.author: Marly

customer_reviews.title: Great for dolls on the beach
customer_reviews.text: I was in a hurry when I ordered these. The cans are so small, my daughters wanted to use it at the beach for their Barbie’s to build mini sand castles. What a ripoff
customer_reviews.author: Tom Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Great gift 🤓
customer_reviews.text: Great for Father's Day gift or a dad or Grandpa's birthday. also it's a very good gift because they can try different flavors and pick out their favorite so they know what to buy
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Flanary

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, works perfectly with my handheld smoke infuser. If used "correctly" your wood will last for hundreds of uses per container. I've used it to smoke cheeses and will be trying it on my beef jerky. It only takes a pinch to get that smokey flavor. I highly recommend this to everyone for their smoke infuser/smoking gun.
customer_reviews.author: CptJeff

customer_reviews.title: Not what was expected
customer_reviews.text: These will get the job done for something you are smoking, if it only requires an hour or two at beat before they are used up
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Poor value for money!
customer_reviews.text: These were not worth what we paid for them!!! They’re good for a beginner to try the different woods but there are better value chips on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: I.zz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the chips that came with my smoke gun they are every bit as good at a fraction of the price
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for use in small kitchen smoking "gun" tool
customer_reviews.text: Great for intended use in small kitchen smoking "guns" for adding smoke to cocktails and food. These come in a contained a little smaller than an ice cream pint, and are very fine. Flavor seemed okay. I'd have liked to be able to purchase individually and have additional variety.
customer_reviews.author: Alli O.

customer_reviews.title: Great smoked flavor
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband who regularly smokes all kinds of meat which turns out extremely flavorful. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: kokolove

customer_reviews.title: Smoking Good Chips!
customer_reviews.text: They work great in our new portable smoker. I watched a chef show that says to make a little foil pouch with slits in it rather than just in the tray and it worked perfectly. 1-2 teaspoons is plenty.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Walz

customer_reviews.title: it's more like wood dust than wood chips
customer_reviews.text: if you can smoke something in 4 minutes then I guess this will work. Barely more than wood dust. Don't buy these so called wood chips. If I could rate lower I "wood", but there is not enough wood in these thimble size containers.
customer_reviews.author: Middle America consumer

customer_reviews.title: Value for your money. This will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: So many choices for all my different foods. Only takes a spoonful so this purchase should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: These wood chips are perfect for my smoking gun
customer_reviews.text: These wood chips are perfect for my smoking gun. I love the variety of flavor that it give the food. The wood ships are really fine. Just a pinch works so these pints of wood chips will last a long time. The wood chips are good quality wood and give my food awesome flavor. I love having different options of wood depending on what I smoke as they each provide a distinct flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Jnorth

customer_reviews.title: Indoor smoker smoking chips
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a new indoor smoker. I used to own the Cameron's smoker, now I own the Nordic Ware version. These smokers use a sawdust like material, not a true " chip " to generate smoke. This vendor had a great 4 pack at a great price. If you own an indoor smoker, you're gonna need to buy this product somewhere. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: B in da Bronx

customer_reviews.title: Saw dust in a can don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Saw Dust, in a small cup. Burns off so fast with little smoke. Would be a good gag gift, it’s a joke
customer_reviews.author: JOHN D.

customer_reviews.title: Rethink your options
customer_reviews.text: Sawdust, filled my electric smoker's hopper to the top! Produced smoke for forty minutes at best!! I was just too lazy to send it back!
customer_reviews.author: Blkbagger

customer_reviews.title: I like these!
customer_reviews.text: Work great in my smoking gun and the quantity is quite a lot. Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: FisterD

customer_reviews.title: I got these with the smoker order, probably would ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these with the smoker order, probably would have picked different flavors, but didn't see any. Also one lid had come off, so had to pour chips from carton back into container, not a big problem. Could have used just one ,didn't need 4.. They burnt really well.
customer_reviews.author: Steelers

customer_reviews.title: Great samples for a smoker box
customer_reviews.text: Four different flavors of wood chips. This was a gift, along with a smoker box, and they loved it. Great for anyone who enjoys outdoor cooking.
customer_reviews.author: krox722

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Container Size for Testing Different Types of Wood Flavors
customer_reviews.text: Like the smaller containers & varieties of woods to smoke with then I can choice which ones I like best and order only those in the next order
customer_reviews.author: L. Kirlin

customer_reviews.title: SAWDUST!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is SAWDUST, completely worthless and they charge you 18 bucks! Returning it today!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Omar Campora

customer_reviews.title: Very good flavor
customer_reviews.text: These wood chips were definitely a good deal especially for the price. They produce a good flavor for any and all smokers.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a Nordic stovetop smoker. This takes fish, meats, veggies and condiments to the next level of delicious. Love the variety and the ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Mamasgottools

customer_reviews.title: Smells great when smoking
customer_reviews.text: Got Test to use with my new smoker recommend soaking them in water first before used to prevent too much char
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Not chips, more like sawdust.
customer_reviews.text: They just came today. I was expecting wood chips. It is more like sawdust. Will see how it does this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: VO

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: Kinda doesn’t for some wood chips. Worked well when I used them in my smoker tho. Would suggest to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the purchase of this product and all of the pints are filled completely to the top (unlike some other brands). I've only tried the hickory smoke so far on some beef that I smoked to make fajitas, needless to say, the fajitas were all consumed by my friends saying how delicious (with just the right smokey flavor) that they were. Now I'm looking forward to using the other flavors soon
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: Dust not chips, burnt easily unsuable
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these, it's just saw dust. Tried using them in an electric smoker and they just burnt up no matter how high I put them
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good shape and on time
customer_reviews.text: Good smoke, burns too fast, I went with a larger size when I had to re-rder
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the stove top smoker
customer_reviews.text: The small shaved size of these wood chips are perfect for a stove top smoker or any light smoking job. The chips smoked nicely with no off or greasy oily residue. I really loved the Cherry but all four were great. I smoked cheese, garlic, and salmon and the taste was fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Becky at the beach

customer_reviews.title: Wood smoker chips
customer_reviews.text: These wood chips make your food so nice and smoky.
customer_reviews.author: char

customer_reviews.title: Thanx
customer_reviews.text: Very fine. Good for use in my stove top smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: 2 Oak, 1 Cherry & 1 hickory
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving 3 starts, the product works fine although The product in the description said it supposed to be Oak,Cherry,Hickory and Alder, I received 2 Oak,1Cherry and 1 Hickory. I already opened It up and used it, before realized that, so I can’t return it back...
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Great selection of wood (scents)!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to add smoke to a few of the drinks at my bar and these wood chips create the best smoke! I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Eric S. Potts

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband and he seems to enjoy using these
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great Wood Chips for the Cameron Stove top Smoker
customer_reviews.text: I didn't consider any other chips when purchasing because nobody makes wood chips like the cameron's product. its more like a saw dust type of consistency vs. actual wood chips. The wood chips work perfect for what I need it for, the Cameron's Stove Top Smoker, I wouldn't use this product in a typical smoker or smoker box. basically it works as it should and the price on the Chips seemed to be the cheapest around.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection
customer_reviews.text: These 4 are a perfect size and nice selection of flavors. The Alderwood is amazing with salmon, which is what I smoke the most.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler742

customer_reviews.title: Wood dust
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it is me but they did not come in as wood chips. They are more like wood dust. The containers are a lot smaller than you think.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easier to use with our electric smoker than actual chips. Not as messy. Flavors good. A bit pricey for the size
customer_reviews.author: melinda davis

customer_reviews.title: Sawdust in puny containers...what a waste
customer_reviews.text: This is basically sawdust. Containers about the size of small coffee cup.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item.
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my smoke infuser. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Road Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend actual wood CHIPS rather than this product
customer_reviews.text: These are sample containers of basically sawdust which quickly burn up too quickly. Would recommend actual wood CHIPS rather than this product.
customer_reviews.author: AAF

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: All the great flavors we like in one package deal
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for indoor smoking
customer_reviews.text: These work great in my Nordic Ware indoor smoker. They are fine, like shredded pieces of wood, not chunks or pellets.
customer_reviews.author: tsvet

customer_reviews.title: It’s still not enough
customer_reviews.text: I could use an even bigger deal cause it won’t take much to use these up
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Pogue

customer_reviews.title: Make for great smoke ..
customer_reviews.text: A lot more quantity than I had bargained for - but not complaining !! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Ankur Bhandari

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item along with a smoking gun for my wife for Christmas, Perfect addtion to the gift. Wood is create and very nicely packaged. Will be using them again soon!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Gray

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Has expanded my smoking through the winter. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Broberg

customer_reviews.title: 4 tiny containers of
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not 4 pint size containers. Received four contains containing a cup and a half of ting shavings of wood. Total ripoff. Will not be able to smoke anything much with all four containers full.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bartolini

customer_reviews.title: Sawdust
customer_reviews.text: This is not wood chips but sawdust. Did not work in my smoker at all
customer_reviews.author: Katkornbau

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Did/Does what it was advertised to do with out any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my uncle as a Christmas gift for his smoker and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I use it with my smoker and it works great. Nice flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Smoking chips
customer_reviews.text: A good product at a reasonable price for our Cameron cooker. The package is a good assortment of woods and this is a more practical purchase than the smaller packages. Shipping by the seller was fast.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and interesting
customer_reviews.text: Pretty interesting, you can definitely taste the differences in the woods and it should eventually make for some gourmet type cooking, though I'm definitely not there yet. I bought this as an accompaniment to the smoker, because just handing someone a metal box felt weird and it went over pretty well. Should make for some happy experimenting.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wood sawdust
customer_reviews.text: Received it and it is as stated. Have not had a chance to smoke anything yet.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great for adding to a smoke gun or other small ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for adding to a smoke gun or other small smoking device such as a smoke tray.
customer_reviews.author: K. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Pint size containers
customer_reviews.text: The containers mislead the buyer.. I understood these to be larger than a pint size container.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Gent

customer_reviews.title: Great wood chips!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome if you have a stovetop smoker pan. Great smelling wood chips, they do the job!
customer_reviews.author: LaGrandeBaker

customer_reviews.title: These Chips are for a cold smoker only.
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly for my cold smoker. The smoke was thick and flavorful. Definitely worth the cost, especially for the variety.
customer_reviews.author: David Pate

customer_reviews.title: Love the smokiness of meat
customer_reviews.text: I tried the hickory and alder chips and a fee tablespoons go a long way. My ribs turned out fantastically and the smokiness came through. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Hoku24

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: A lot for the buck. Burns great. Smoked cheese with the cherry and a roast with the oak.
customer_reviews.author: Chris pridie sr

customer_reviews.title: Burns up much too fast
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that the wood didn't last as long as it should have in 20 min it was gone and stoped smoking.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Well, not quite sure what to say. Box was crushed and some of the containers were busted leaving saw dust all over the inside of the box. I should have read more carefully about the size of each container. For $26 I expected more but the amount that you get will not last long if you smoke a lot. Considering you can get a couple pounds if wood chips for a fraction of the cost. Ill find a way to make my own saw dust for a stove top smoker. Ill probably never order this product again and advise others to shop around or make their own.
customer_reviews.author: john campo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It was opened and all the wood chips was mix up
customer_reviews.author: LULU

customer_reviews.title: Jury is still out
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work, but I am still working out the flavor details.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Weir

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on quality smoking chips. Love all of the flavors too, especially Hickory
customer_reviews.author: S. Caton

customer_reviews.title: Good smoke and flavor
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Starting our second batch of chips. We use our stove-top smoker several times a month. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: charlesb

customer_reviews.title: Good variety
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tried all of them yet but favor is good and size is good as they smoke up well
customer_reviews.author: Mrs KG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these wood chips to go with my Cameron Stovetop Smoker. This pack has four types of chips with totally different profiles. The smoker requires so little that these will last for a very long time. When I run out, I will absolutely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Flavors up smoked meats perfectly. A little goes a long way with our stovetop smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: I have used similar products bundle with Camerons stovetop smoker and they worked great. The chips really provide excellent flavors to what ever you are smoking. Important to follow the direction to obtain the best quality smoked foods. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: PCDoc

customer_reviews.title: Very Fine Shavings
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize the chips were so finely chopped. Would have like larger chunks of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: was so surprised that these wood smoking chips work. they are not really chips per se. not quite saw dust. But it works well on my DIY stove top smoker. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: dima

product_meta.title: Oak, Cherry, Hickory, and Alder Wood Smoking Chips- 4 Pints (0.473176 L) Wood Smoker Shavings Value Pack- Resealable Pints of Extra Fine Cut Sawdust - Perfect for Smoking Guns, Smokers, Smoke Boxes
feature_bullets: Smoking Wood Chips - Easy to handle in a resealable 1-pint container.
Barbecue Smoking Chips - Each 1-pint container will yield approximately 30 smoking's.
Smoker Shavings - Sawdust wood chip shavings are raw timber, kiln dried, 100% natural, and made in the USA.
Smoker Chips - Ignite quickly and com-bust 100% to create a delicate smoky flavor.
Flavored Wood Smoking Chips pairs well with poultry, seafood, lamb, pork, beef and cheeses.
